modShortDescription: Adds craftable canned goods and preserved foods. New canned vegetables, new preserved berries and more.
modDescription:
Adds craftable canned goods and preserved foods.

## Features

* Added recipes for the vanilla canned [foods](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-food/) that are used in advanced recipes
* Added new canned vegetables, with recipes – unlocked at Master Chef tier 4
* Added new preserved berries, with recipes – unlocked at Master Chef tier 3
* Added versions of vanilla recipes that use canned vegetables and preserved berries

## Possible Improvements

Better localization – Khzmusik need help with this!

## Technical Details

This mod uses XPath to modify XML files, and does not require SDX or DMT. It should be compatible with EAC.

However, the mod also includes new non-XML resources (new icons). These resources are not pushed from server to client. For this reason, the mod should be installed on both servers and clients.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-a19-modlets-master.zip?path=khzmusik_Preserved_Foods)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/24348-a19-khzmusiks-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Khzmusik](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khzmusik/)
